alert.note: Alert for Okaloosa Coastal; Okaloosa Inland; Santa Rosa Inland (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 27 at 2:30PM EDT by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Okaloosa and southeastern Santa Rosa Counties through 215 PM CDT... At 129 PM CDT, National Weather Service doppler radar indicated a strong thunderstorm 4 miles northwest of Wright, moving northwest at 5 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Wright and Mary Esther. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Okaloosa Coastal; Okaloosa Inland; Santa Rosa Inland
